name: FLYING AROUND THE WORLD IN 80 HOURS!
description:
I followed in Phileas Fogg's footsteps by Flying Around The World in 80 Hours! My trip around the world took in Kuwait, India, Singapore and the USA, with a combined distance of 22000 miles!  I flew business class on some of the world's best airlines; Singapore Airlines, Kuwait Airways and Virgin Atlantic, as well as domestic flights in India with Vistara and Indigo.

My route for this flight: London, Kuwait, Delhi, Ahmedabad, Mumbai, Singapore, Los Angeles and London!

Thanks to Limobike for the ride across London - check them out limobike.com!

=====
